title: Mazhai Nindra Song Lyrics Raman Thediya Seethai
stanzas: <div>Mazhai Nindra Song Lyrics Raman Thediya Seethai

Mazhai nindra pinbum
thooral pola
unai marandha pinbum
kaadhal.

alai kadatha pibum
eeram pola
unai pirintha pinbum
paadal.

enakkum kadhal piranthirukke
atharkun peyar vaikattumaa
enakul idhayam thanithirukke
adhai unnidam serkkatumaa

Mazhai nindra pinbum
thooral pola
unai marandha pinbum
kaadhal.

alai kadatha pibum
eeram pola
unai pirintha pinbum
paadal.

neerthuligal nilamvithaal
pookkal mella thalai asaikkum
en manadhil nee nulainthaai
mounam kooda isai amaikkum

poonguyilgal marainthirunthaal
koovum oasai maraivathillai
thamaraiyaai naan irundhum
thaagam innum adangavillai

paatham irandu nadakkum
indha payanathil enna nadakkum
vaanam irukkum varaikkum
indha vaanavil unnudan irukkum

mazhai thuli pani thuli
kalintha pinne
adhu marubati irandena
printhidumaa

Mazhai nindra pinbum
thooral pola
unai marandha pinbum
kaadhal.

alai kadatha pibum
eeram pola
unai pirintha pinbum
paadal.

Kan imaigal kai thattiye
unnai mella alaikirathe
un seviyil vilavillaiyaa
ullam konjam valikkirathe

unnaruge naan irunthum
unami solla thunivu illai
kaigalile viral irunthum
kaigal korka mudiyavillai

unnai enakku pudikkum
adhai solvathilthane thayakkam
neeye sollum varaiyum
en kadhalum kaathu kidakum

Mazhai nindra pinbum
thooral pola
unai marandha pinbum
kaadhal.

alai kadatha pibum
eeram pola
unai pirintha pinbum
paadal.

enakkum kadhal piranthirukke
atharkun peyar vaikattumaa
enakul idhayam thanithirukke
adhai unnidam serkkatumaa
